vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Κλεόπας, -α (see B1., § 7, 2), ὁ
Cleopas: Luk.24:18.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Luk.24.18; married to Mary (G3137K); also called Clopas (KJV: Cleophas) at Jhn.19.25;
§ Cleopas, "renowned father"
Cleopas, (Proper name), Lk. 24:18*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
革流巴 这个陽性專有名詞在希腊文的意思是 "有名望的父"
耶穌復活那天, 往以馬忤斯路上的二個門徒之一 (路 24:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
革流巴 这个阳性专有名词在希腊文的意思是 "有名望的父"
耶稣复活那天, 往以马忤斯路上的二个门徒之一 (路 24:18)
